Reviews.Title: This is the first phone I've really loved
Reviews.Author: Corky
Reviews.Content: I basically use a phone for calling people. I don't surf the web or text people so I don't care about those functions. First off the phone is a nice size around the width of a razor but a little longer and it is a little thicker. when you open the phone up you notice how big the keypad is and it has separate nice size buttons with big numbers instead of a cheap one piece printed board with small keys like the Motorola's do. the inside screen is large it is bigger than a Razor. What I like about this LG is that it feels like a quality phone, It's solid the interface is easy to use and figure out. Their phones seem to be well thought out. The only thing that I don't like is that there is one key on the top that is used for information on different types of wines, they should of used it for a link to voice mail or calls received. Other than that it's an excellent phone.

Reviews.Title: Good for Anyone
Reviews.Author: J C
Reviews.Content: Very nice phone. Large Keypad, good looking screen and easy to follow user interfaces are strong points for this phone. No wonder this phone won 'good phone design' or something like that when it first came out at South Korea. Stereo Ear bud(3.5mm) & USB cables are included for your MP3 music listening/transfer.

Reviews.Title: Dropped Calls
Reviews.Author: Jason M. Zimmerman
Reviews.Content: This is a well-designed phone from an aesthetic perspective, but it suffers from dropped calls nearly every time I'm on the road.  I use the Cingular 3G network.

Reviews.Title: LG KF 300
Reviews.Author: spreaderl4000
Reviews.Content: I like this phone but it would not work with the provider I have in my area because it is a TRI-BAND so check with your provider before you order. Amazon was great they sent me another one thinking something was wrong with the first one.

Reviews.Title: LG KF300
Reviews.Author: Bobbie Casher "Bobbie  Casher"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the LG KF300 and I like it a lot.After I purchased it from amazon I found it on another sitefor $116.00 and a 2 year warranty to boot.I paid $149.00. Igave it a 4 because I wish the battery lasted longer.
